title: Select Budget Committee Session I 7/31/20
description:
In-person attendance is currently prohibited per the Washington Governor's Proclamation No. 20-28.7, et seq., until August 1, 2020. Meeting participation is limited to access by telephone conference line and Seattle Channel online.

Agenda: Agenda: Public Comment; CB 119825: 2020 Budget - changing appropriations to various departments and budget control levels; CB 119824: 2020 Budget - accepting funds from non-City sources.
